comment.body: For Chrome you can also use this plugin: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/zeronet-protocol/cpkpdcdljfbnepgfejplkhdnopniieop
@Treegb: VeraCrypt is based on TrueCrypt source code and it was audited multiple times in the last years by different researchers, so I think it's (at least) as good as cryptsetup.
